list.position: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
list.description: Major in Computer Science with a minor in Interactive Media Arts and Mathematics
Successfully enrolled and prepared to commence studies in Spring 2024
The research focuses on Computer Music. We aim to transfer performance between different pianos to make them sound alike as much as possible.
which: Developed a simulator algorithm using python
Co-authored a paper titled 'Modeling Perceptual Loudness of Piano Tone'

title.text: From Anime to Reality: Transforming Anime Images into Real Images

list.description: Our goal is to transform animated images into realistic images, which has profound applications in areas such as game character modeling and generating real-life videos from cartoon drawings.
which: Participated in the design and execution of a series of experiments
Conducted in-depth studies on various generative models
